Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class roboptim::retargeting::Torque< T >

Compute the Torque of each joint.

Input:

...where q is [x, y, z, alpha, beta, gamma, q0, qN]

(x, y, z) is the base position (alpha, beta, gamma) is base attitude using angle axis representation (q0, ..., qN) are the joints values

Output:

Template Parameters:
TFunction traits type
